title: Prepare a Lease Abstract
description: A new property manager is taking over a building and needs to create abstracts for all existing leases for quick reference.

tasks.description: Gather all executed lease agreements for the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all the lease documents.

tasks.description: For each lease, extract and summarize critical information: tenant name, suite, lease term, rent schedule, renewal options, and key clauses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately extracts the key data points from a complex legal document.

tasks.description: Compile the abstracts into a single, organized document for the property management team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a useful summary document for the team.
